title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Only start once after SMC reset and then shuts down at login screen
message:
Got this one today. Won't turn on unless I do an SMC reset. Then starts and shuts down two seconds after login screen. I then need to reset the SMC again to get it starting again.
I have already replaced the Poly-Tant capacitor.
Any idea on where to start on this one?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Only start once after SMC reset and then shuts down at login screen
message: History, liquid? ASD test? Keyboard disconnected?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Only start once after SMC reset and then shuts down at login screen
message: Sorry for the late reply. I have now done some ASD testing. The board shows no sign of water damage and the ASD runs fine with no errors.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Only start once after SMC reset and then shuts down at login screen
message: Disconnect keyboard and battery, otherwise I have no idea.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Only start once after SMC reset and then shuts down at login screen
message: I have done that as well, when I got around to it again today the battery had startet to swell, so I don't have a battery anymore...

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Only start once after SMC reset and then shuts down at login screen
message: Just an update, got this one to work now. Thank you Duke. You put me in the right direction. It was both the keyboard and U5701.
